column1: Baoqing County (simplified Chinese: 宝清县; traditional Chinese: 寶清縣; pinyin: Bǎoqīng Xiàn) is a county of southeastern Heilongjiang province
column2: People's Republic of China. It is under the jurisdiction of the prefecture-level city of Shuangyashan.
and four townships in the county:

column1: Baoqing has a humid continental climate (Köppen Dwa)
column6: very warm summers. The monthly 24-hour average temperature ranges from −17.5 °C (0.5 °F) in January to 22.3 °C (72.1 °F)
